verses.verse: עוּרִ֥י <S%H5782><s%> Awake עוּרִ֛י <S%H5782><s%> awake לִבְשִׁ֥י <S%H3847><s%> put on עֻזֵּ֖ךְ <S%H5797><s%> thy strength צִיּ֑וֹן <S%H6726><s%> O Zion לִבְשִׁ֣י ׀ <S%H3847><s%> put on בִּגְדֵ֣י <S%H899><s%> garments תִפְאַרְתֵּ֗ךְ <S%H8597><s%> thy beautiful יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> O Jerusalem עִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> city הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> the holy כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> will no יוֹסִ֛יף <S%H3254><s%> for henceforth there shall no more יָבֹא־ <S%H935><s%> come בָ֥ךְ ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again עָרֵ֥ל <S%H6189><s%> into thee the uncircumcised וְטָמֵֽא׃ <S%H2931><s%> and the unclean

הִתְנַעֲרִ֧י <S%H5287><s%> Shake מֵעָפָ֛ר <S%H6083><s%> thyself from the dust ק֥וּמִי <S%H6965><s%> arise שְּׁבִ֖י <S%H3427><s%> [and] sit down יְרֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> O Jerusalem [הִתְפַּתְּחוּ כ] (הִֽתְפַּתְּחִי֙ <S%H6605><s%> appear ק) מוֹסְרֵ֣י <S%H4147><s%> thyself from the bands צַוָּארֵ֔ךְ <S%H6677><s%> of thy neck שְׁבִיָּ֖ה <S%H7628><s%> O captive בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> daughter צִיּֽוֹן׃ <S%H6726><s%> of Zion ס

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For כֹה֙ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> For thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD חִנָּ֖ם <S%H2600><s%> yourselves for nought נִמְכַּרְתֶּ֑ם <S%H4376><s%> Ye have sold וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> without בְכֶ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> without money תִּגָּאֵֽלוּ׃ <S%H1350><s%> and ye shall be redeemed

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For כֹ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> For thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD מִצְרַ֛יִם <S%H4714><s%> into Egypt יָֽרַד־ <S%H3381><s%> went down עַמִּ֥י <S%H5971><s%> My people בָרִֽאשֹׁנָ֖ה <S%H7223><s%> aforetime לָג֣וּר <S%H1481><s%> to sojourn שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> there וְאַשּׁ֖וּר <S%H804><s%> there and the Assyrian בְּאֶ֥פֶס <S%H657><s%> them without cause עֲשָׁקֽוֹ׃ <S%H6231><s%> oppressed

וְעַתָּ֤ה <S%H6258><s%> Now [מִי־ לי־ כ] (מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> how long לִּי־ פֹה֙ <S%H6311><s%> have here ק) נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> Now therefore what have I here saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לֻקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> is taken away עַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> that my people חִנָּ֑ם <S%H2600><s%> without [מֹשְׁלֹו כ] (מֹשְׁלָ֤יו <S%H4910><s%> reign ק) יְהֵילִ֙ילוּ֙ <S%H3213><s%> over them make them to howl נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְתָמִ֥יד <S%H8548><s%> continually כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> every day שְׁמִ֥י <S%H8034><s%> and my name מִנֹּאָֽץ׃ <S%H5006><s%> [is] blasphemed

לָכֵ֛ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore יֵדַ֥ע <S%H3045><s%> shall know עַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> Therefore my people שְׁמִ֑י <S%H8034><s%> my name לָכֵן֙ <S%H3651><s%> therefore בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> therefore [they shall know] in that day הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֲנִי־ <S%H589><s%> I ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> who הַֽמְדַבֵּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> that I [am] he that doth speak הִנֵּֽנִי׃ <S%H2005><s%> behold

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> How נָּאו֨וּ <S%H4998><s%> How beautiful עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הֶהָרִ֜ים <S%H2022><s%> upon the mountains רַגְלֵ֣י <S%H7272><s%> are the feet מְבַשֵּׂ֗ר <S%H1319><s%> of him that bringeth good tidings מַשְׁמִ֧יעַ <S%H8085><s%> that publisheth שָׁל֛וֹם <S%H7965><s%> peace מְבַשֵּׂ֥ר <S%H1319><s%> that bringeth good tidings ט֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> of good מַשְׁמִ֣יעַ <S%H8085><s%> that publisheth יְשׁוּעָ֑ה <S%H3444><s%> salvation אֹמֵ֥ר <S%H559><s%> that saith לְצִיּ֖וֹן <S%H6726><s%> unto Zion מָלַ֥ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigneth אֱלֹהָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H430><s%> Thy God

ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice צֹפַ֛יִךְ <S%H6822><s%> Thy watchmen נָ֥שְׂאוּ <S%H5375><s%> shall lift up ק֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> with the voice יַחְדָּ֣ו <S%H3162><s%> together יְרַנֵּ֑נוּ <S%H7442><s%> shall they sing כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> with עַ֤יִן <S%H5869><s%> eye בְּעַ֙יִן֙ <S%H5869><s%> to eye יִרְא֔וּ <S%H7200><s%> for they shall see בְּשׁ֥וּב <S%H7725><s%> shall bring again יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> when the LORD צִיּֽוֹן׃ <S%H6726><s%> Zion

פִּצְח֤וּ <S%H6476><s%> Break forth into joy רַנְּנוּ֙ <S%H7442><s%> sing יַחְדָּ֔ו <S%H3162><s%> together חָרְב֖וֹת <S%H2723><s%> ye waste places יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נִחַ֤ם <S%H5162><s%> hath comforted יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD עַמּ֔וֹ <S%H5971><s%> his people גָּאַ֖ל <S%H1350><s%> he hath redeemed יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem

חָשַׂ֤ף <S%H2834><s%> hath made bare יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זְר֣וֹעַ <S%H2220><s%> arm קָדְשׁ֔וֹ <S%H6944><s%> his holy לְעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> in the eyes כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> of all the nations וְרָאוּ֙ <S%H7200><s%> shall see כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אַפְסֵי־ <S%H657><s%> and all the ends אָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> יְשׁוּעַ֥ת <S%H3444><s%> the salvation אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> of our God ס

ס֤וּרוּ <S%H5493><s%> Depart ס֙וּרוּ֙ <S%H5493><s%> ye depart צְא֣וּ <S%H3318><s%> ye go ye out מִשָּׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> there טָמֵ֖א <S%H2931><s%> no unclean אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nothing תִּגָּ֑עוּ <S%H5060><s%> from thence touch צְא֣וּ <S%H3318><s%> [thing] go ye out מִתּוֹכָ֔הּ <S%H8432><s%> of the midst הִבָּ֕רוּ <S%H1305><s%> of her be ye clean נֹשְׂאֵ֖י <S%H5375><s%> that bear כְּלֵ֥י <S%H3627><s%> the vessels יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> Nor בְחִפָּזוֹן֙ <S%H2649><s%> with haste תֵּצֵ֔אוּ <S%H3318><s%> For ye shall not go out וּבִמְנוּסָ֖ה <S%H4499><s%> by flight לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor תֵלֵכ֑וּן <S%H1980><s%> will go כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הֹלֵ֤ךְ <S%H1980><s%> will go לִפְנֵיכֶם֙ <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God וּמְאַסִּפְכֶ֖ם <S%H622><s%> [will be] your rereward אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> you and the God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel ס

הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold יַשְׂכִּ֖יל <S%H7919><s%> shall deal prudently עַבְדִּ֑י <S%H5650><s%> Behold my servant יָר֧וּם <S%H7311><s%> he shall be exalted וְנִשָּׂ֛א <S%H5375><s%> and extolled וְגָבַ֖הּ <S%H1361><s%> high מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> and be very

כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after שָׁמְמ֤וּ <S%H8074><s%> were astonied עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> as רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> As many כֵּן־ <S%H3651><s%> you So מִשְׁחַ֥ת <S%H4893><s%> was so marred מֵאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> more than any man מַרְאֵ֑הוּ <S%H4758><s%> at thee his visage וְתֹאֲר֖וֹ <S%H8389><s%> and his form מִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> more than the sons אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> of men

כֵּ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> Thus יַזֶּה֙ <S%H5137><s%> So shall he sprinkle גּוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> nations רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> many עָלָ֛יו <S%H5921><s%> account יִקְפְּצ֥וּ <S%H7092><s%> shall shut מְלָכִ֖ים <S%H4428><s%> the kings פִּיהֶ֑ם <S%H6310><s%> their mouths כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> For אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> what לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> had not סֻפַּ֤ר <S%H5608><s%> at him for [that] which had not been told לָהֶם֙ רָא֔וּ <S%H7200><s%> them shall they see וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> and what לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> had not שָׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> and [that] which they had not heard הִתְבּוֹנָֽנוּ׃ <S%H995><s%> shall they consider
